description:
Cornered by Ocoho, the Merchant Barons show their true colors. It seemed this would be the end of the battle, but the when the Inquisitor Ullmina learns that Santori has been lost, she has an even more powerful Harmonizium dropped into the forest. The Fantasia there begins to disappear, and the soldiers under the control of Ullmina`s powerful miracle close in on the castle wall. Seth hurries to the forest, concerned about Myr and Jill, and he finds Myr in a state of despair. His grief over losing what was most precious to him then turns to intense rage...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Hear Your Voice: Myrddin
Je n`entends pas ta voix: Myrddin
Kimi no Koe ga Kikoenai: Myrddin
